post.title: panasonic 42 px80 owners,colour settings for hd
post.content: so now ive got a sky hd box i want to get the wow factor again when watching sky,so what settings looks best when watching hd channels? i know everyone has a different view but i was just seeing if there is a common setting. at the moment i have: settings are from 0 so 0 to 38 (normal) - contrast 38 - brightness 32 - colour 28 - sharpness 3 - colour temp normal
